content.raw:
So I spent a long time tracing things and trying to figure out why they fail sometimes, why they pass other times. And came to the conclusion that there are a lot of messages going back and forth and sometimes there isn't enough time for all of this to happen. So my solution for now was to add some long sleeps. Let me know if anyone can think of a better solution. I added some comments to the code too. 5eeab52

Oh, and even with all the sleeps, `PluginCount` and `World::SensorsInitialized` seem to fail sometimes.
content.html:
So I spent a long time tracing things and trying to figure out why they fail sometimes, why they pass other times. And came to the conclusion that there are a lot of messages going back and forth and sometimes there isn't enough time for all of this to happen. So my solution for now was to add some long sleeps. Let me know if anyone can think of a better solution. I added some comments to the code too. 5eeab52

Oh, and even with all the sleeps, PluginCount and World::SensorsInitialized seem to fail sometimes.
